title: How to Be Miserable and Ruin Your Life
description:
Do you complain constantly? Always feel like you’re under attack? 

Well, congratulations, these alone tell me that you’re already well on your way to becoming a miserable sack of sh*t. In this video, I share 9 simple steps on how to take absolutely no responsibility for yourself, how to become 100% unlikeable and how to go and live unhappily ever after as the worst possible version of yourself.

You can thank me when no one shows up to your funeral.

(This video is based on my article written in Nov, 2012: https://markmanson.net/the-guide-to-being-miserable)
